head.title: Bush Adapts and Goes on the Attack

hedline.hl1: Bush Adapts and Goes on the Attack

abstract.p: Photo of Gov George W Bush in Austin, Tex

block.p: After watching his lead in the polls evaporate, Gov. George W. Bush is adjusting and adapting his campaign strategy. In the past, when Vice President Al Gore belittled him, Mr. Bush expressed something akin to bemusement. No more. A new Republican commercial casts Mr. Gore as an untrustworthy, untruthful chameleon. And in his own whirl of campaign trips, Mr. Bush plans to pick apart Mr. Gore's policies and raise more pointed questions about his leadership. PAGE A14
